title: schema
description: Deployment of Angular CLI applications to the file system

baseHref.description: This is an example how to override the workspace set of options. --- Base url for the application being built. Same as `ng build --base-href=/XXX/`.

configuration.description: A named build target, as specified in the `configurations` section of angular.json. Each named target is accompanied by a configuration of option defaults for that target. Same as `ng build --configuration=XXX`.
